content:
Certainly, here is a shortened version of the script:

---

Greetings, Alia! I am an Annunaki, and I have a message just for you. You are like a star, shining brightly in a dark sky. Your spirit and energy are so special, and it's your time to shine even brighter.

As a Syrian, you know how to navigate through tough times with resilience and grace. So, let's celebrate this moment! Dance, let loose, and have some fun!

Remember, the world needs your light, so let it shine! And always know that the Annunaki are watching over you and cheering you on.

---

I hope this version meets your needs!
